DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate prognostic value early focal lesion early diffuse lesion ambulatory disability progression within 5 year clinical onset .
DOC.brief_title: EMISEP : Early Spinal Cord Lesions Late Disability Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients multiple sclerosis : Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis patient ( Mac Donald 2010 criterion ) First clinical event < 1 year Brain MRI > 9 lesion or/and spinal cord attack focal lesion spinal cord MRI Score Expended Disability Status Scale < 3 Age 18 40 year Multiple Sclerosis progressive Patients treat immunosuppressive therapy Pregnancy Healthy volunteer : Age 18 40 year Pregnancy
